title: Fully integrated Space (PARA / Tasks / Resources / Meeting notes / CRM)
description:
Here is my fully integrated space. Where I embrace the PARA Methodology. This Space includes the following aspects:

- PARA
- Meeting notes 
- CRM
- Library 
- Wiki
- Tasks and Projects
